definition: an examination and dissection of a dead body to determine cause of death or the changes produced by disease, to perform an autopsy on a dead body
details:
noun
- an examination and dissection of a dead body to determine cause of death or the changes produced by disease
= synonyms: necropsy, post-mortem, postmortem examination, post-mortem examination, postmortem
verb
- to perform an autopsy on a dead body
= example: to perform an autopsy on a dead body
